C is imperative, not functional. Functional programming means programming without (or avoiding) side-effects so that code behaves like mathematical functions. typical C is the exact opposite of functional programming. You can write some C code in functional style.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/functional-programming-vs-imperative-programming
